headline: Square AI Puts Data Driven Assistant At Heart Of Block Story
summary: Square, part of Block (NYSE:XYZ), launched "Square AI", an integrated conversational AI assistant for UK businesses. The tool sits inside the existing Square platform and is available to UK small and medium sized enterprises. Square AI is designed to help business owners make data driven decisions and manage day to day operations more efficiently. For Block, which already serves merchants through payments, software, and financial services, this launch extends its toolkit further into AI...
